item.title: Raichur: Woman’s body found in canal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: Woman’s body found in canal
Vartha Bharati | 12-01-2025 | 11:02:00 IST
Representational Image
Raichur: A woman’s body was discovered on Saturday in the Tungabhadra Left Bank Canal near Hanchinal (U) village in Sindhanur taluk.
The deceased has been identified as Sharannamma Hemanna Nayaka Ratnapur Hatti(55). Reports suggest she was suffering from mental health issues.
A case has been registered at the Turvihal police station, and an investigation is underway.
Get all the latest,...]]>
item.author: Vartha Bharathi
